评论详情: This shirt is not quite as bright as the picture in the listing, but it is a beautiful color. The shirt is sized just right. It is thin, but not too thin or see through. It is soft and feels really nice on. I like the cap sleeve, and the ruched sides make it pleasingly form fitting. When spring comes I think I would like a few more of these shirts.

love this crew neck tshirt it is the perfect size and style to be dressed but not overly dressed the style is comfortable along with the fabric it is made of i love this shirt and most likely order one in every color!
Well made and very stylish. My wife really likes the look of it and says it fit true to size. The material is soft and slightly stretchy and seems to be high quality. Would buy again in other colors.
This top has a comfortable and flattering fit. I love that it hinds mt trouble spot. Very comfortable soft fabric. Fit is true to size. Recommend purchasing. It is a great value.

Shirt is loose and hides what needs to be hidden.  Fabric is soft and comfortable.  Doesn't appear to wrinkle a lot.  I'm ordering more in different colors.  I am 5 ft 6 in 170 lbs 38DD XL is size ordered.

I wanted a plain T-shirt to wear alone or under sweaters.  This is perfect. Not too tight or loose and flattering on. . Fabric and fit is great  I ordered in black and white. The white did fit a bit smaller but not enough to return.Honestly I thought I’d be returning these but very pleased with them.
This top is good quality and has a really flattering, and feminine fit. The material is soft and comfortable too. This is a definite staple in the casual tee wardrobe.

I ordered the cadet blue which is a soft teal. Very pretty color. This top fits true to size but is not a loose fit but more body skimming. The length hits at my hip which is perfect. The ruching adds some style to this top and helps to conceal and draw attention away from problem areas. The material is soft and silky and feels of good quality. It has a bit of stretch allowing the shirt to move with you. The cap sleeves provide some arm concealment for those who do not like full arm exposure. It washed and dried well in my home washer and dryer. Great price for a summer basic.

Material is 60% Polyester, 35% Rayon, 5% Spandex and feels like soft cotton. The coral is beautiful. Images are of a size Small. Daughter is now anxiously awaiting warm temperatures. The secure ruching and cut of a round hem make this a perfect design. Launder in a garment bag, tumble dry on low for a few minutes, then hang to complete drying with great results. The cost of $15 USD makes this a value purchase.

评论概述: Comfortable, basic tee shirt at a fantastic price
评论详情: This tee shirt is surprisingly soft and comfortable, made of a 60% polyester, 35% rayon, 5% spandex blend. I always look for cap sleeves because I find them to be most comfortable and flattering, and this did not disappoint. What sets this basic tee apart from others is the ruching on the sides. This gives it a bit of a draped look which can be helpful to hide any tummy or waist issues. This shirt fits true to size in my opinion. It is not too fitted or cropped, so it could be worn out or tucked in to a skirt or pants. It is basic enough that it can be dressed up or down for virtually any occasion, either on its own or under a blazer. It's easy care-just toss it in the machine and line dry. Mine arrived wrinkled due to vacuum packing and a few minutes in the dryer had it ready to wear.
Size fits right. Good looking top with a nice weight to fabric.  Not see through thin but light weight and comfortable.

The Sampeel summer cap short sleeve tee is a nice, casual top. The color is a bright, royal blue as shown. I typically wear an 18/20 due to bust size, and the XXL fits well. It's a bit big in the back but the front is fitted. It survived the first wash without any issues or color loss. It's a well-made top that's worth the price.

This black shirt with ruching on the sides is very comfortable.  The fabric is soft and true to size.  This is sleeveless but has a little bit of a cap sleeve.  Definitely recommend this cute shirt for any season of the year.
This top fits well, it is comfortable and flattering. This shirt is soft, lightweight but not see through. It fits me very well.

I’m not entirely sure if it fits as expected or not, the ruching makes it a bit hard to judge. I ordered my normal size and it’s a bit tight, but the only clothing I’ve ever owned with ruching are my pre-kids bodycon dresses. So in my experience, ruching is meant to be tight.  It’s still a comfy shirt though—very soft and it’s got good stretch. The sleeves aren’t as nonexistent as they appear to be before putting it on, they are definitely short short so if you have upper arm insecurities, I’d pass on this shirt.  The color is really pretty and summery. It’s actually slightly lighter than it appeared on my screen (which is weird, stuff usually ends up being darker for me), it’s almost pastely in real life.  Overall I maybe wish it fit slightly looser, but I still think it’ll be a nice vacation (which is why I ordered it) and summer shirt.

This shirt arrived quickly and the color was just as pictured, I got the burgundy. The shirt fits me a little  tight so I would order the next size up because now the sleeves seem too short and you can’t really notice the side detailing. The material is nice for everyday and no ironing needed.

This is a beautiful shirt when you get it on. Looks square and boxy before you put it on. It is really nice. The material is soft and the rouching on the side is very flattering. It is comfortable to wear and the color is vibrant.

This is a surprisingly nice T for the price. The ruching detail along the two lower side seams gives it an extra touch that most Ts don't have, and that with the shorter sleeves create a slimming silhouette. My significant other loves it and particularly likes the fabric, which is a soft, comfy mix of polyester, rayon and spandex. The added details of this T mean you could dress it up or down, depending on the occasion.
